fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select a target for interrogation during the day.
- Attack a player who is *not* being interrogated by you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Interrogating a target will functionally Jail them. You will appear as a Jailor if you have not killed a player, otherwise you will appear as a Mercenary.
- If a player you are interrogating attacks you through an attribute of attacking Jailors, you will block the attack and retaliate, automatically attacking that player instead of your main target. If and only if your target survives the attack, they will attack you.

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value:
- You have been sent by an organization to eradicate the anomalous. At the start of the game, the host will go through all roles in the game and determine them to either be anomalous or normal, anomalous roles being any role that uses supernatural abilities (such as Retributionist) that are not normally a thing that can exist. Those players are your targets, and they oppose you, and you must *live* to see those players die. You will face penalties by your organization for incorrect kills.
- At one incorrect kill, you lose your defense.
- At two incorrect kills, you are hanged with one less vote.
- At three incorrect kills, your organization will remove you for incompetency. Your goal will change from "Kill everyone who would oppose you." to "Kill everyone who would oppose you." ||Your goal becomes NK goal.||
- At four incorrect kills, you regain your defense, you are hanged with the normal amount of votes again, and your attack is increased to Unstoppable.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose you.
